name: Starbase Manager (Pre-Alpha Play Test 1)
description:
Starbase Manager is an ambitious project. I would not be able to achieve the full scope without an engaged community and feedback in the discussion board.

The current status of Starbase Manager is a prototype idea, this is a pre-alpha playtest. Expect the experience to be glitchy and incomplete in many areas, with a large amount of placeholder art, very limited content and unbalanced. Information on future updates may be released depending on feedback.

Please report bugs and leave feedback in the Discussion Board, thank you!

Pre-Alpha Playtest 1 includes:

You will be given control of a Starbase where you will need to manage many different elements such as:

  • Managing and Generating Resources
  • Research new weapons, systems and more
  • Commanding your fleet on Exploration Expeditions (with 8 random results)
  • Upgrading the Starbase, for example Advanced Systems and more
  • Trading resources with other Factions
  • Defending the Starbase
  • Oversee Diplomatic Relationships
